choices: Was pulled back by another student
1.content:
Amber made her way through the halls of her new high school, trying to appear a lot calmer that she really was. Moving to a new city where her mom and dad just got new, better paying jobs and going to a whole different school where she knew no one was difficult enough; but when that school was filled with all sorts of monsters that would certainly enjoy swallowing her whole was a level of difficulty she never imagined.

Many of the girls watched Amber as she passed. Some glared angrily at her, greatly disliking the fact that a human was allowed to come to their turf. Other’s licked their lips as she went by, at the very least imagining what she might taste like. There even was one or two that smiled and waved at her, trying to be friendly to the new kid.

Amber eventually came to the door to her first class. She grabbed the handle and…
1.title: The new girl

choices: Nothing goes wrong, but Miss Konda holds Amber after class
11.content:
Amber took a deep breath and turned the handle, the door opened and she entered the room.

“Ah, you must be Amber. Welcome to science class.” Came the cheerful words from behind a large desk. Seated at that desk was a lady naga with long fiery red hair, bright pink eyes, and copper colored scales. “I’m Miss Konda, you’re teacher for this year.” The naga continued introducing herself.

“Pleased to meet you.” Amber said as she took a seat by the front. As intimidated by Miss Konda as she was, Amber didn’t want to miss any part of the lesson.
11.title: Sssssscience

112.content:
Miss Konda asked you "What is your favourite animal?" you replied by saying that it is the snake much to her delight.
Miss Konda then asks you to show how much you know about chemistry so you are asked to mix up a dozen chemicals and drink it.
Which Miss Konda assures you that the resulting mixture will be safe.
As the class went on with its genetic lesson you worked through class on the mixture.
When the class finished you finish the liquid and you show it to Miss Konda and she said that you that it is safe enough to drink.
So after swallowing the large vial of liquid you went back home to your room but you felt a bit sick.

The next morning you hpooed out of beed only to fall flat on your face. "What was it that I tripped on?"
You look at your legs to find that they merge at your waist into a giant snake tail. Amber shook her head as long dark curls of hairs flopped this way and that. Her tiny female fingers smoothed down over the tough scales of snakelike skin which covered what was once her legs.

As her eyes changed in color to a evil mint green her thoughts turned to a feeling of hatred toward men. As Ambers brother Robert looked at his Sister's strange change he inched to the doorway leading from their kitchen to the back porch.

"Easy there little Brother, you are not trying to run away from me your loving Sister?" says April as her snake eyes stare into Robert's.
112.title: Something happens

choices: Miss Konda wants to give Amber some information about the school
Miss Konda was to give Amber some 'extra credit.'
113.content:
"Before the bell rings class, you all need to have your Textbook: Exploring Mother Nature the Biology edition, 5th edition, by Tia Danson by the end of next week. I'll reward any students with an extra ten points on their next test in two weeks, 25 points if you have it by Wednesday of this week." Miss Konda replied as the School bell ringed, signaling the end of the first period of the day. Everyone filed out of the room, as Amber was just about to leave when...

"Oh Amber, can you hold on for a second, there's something I need to talk to you about before you go."

"Ok." Amber replied as she sat her bookbag down on a nearby desk. Two waited until all the other students have left, when they did, Amber turned towards Miss Konda.

"So, what did you need to talk to me about?" Amber asked.

Miss Konda smiled.
113.title: Nothing goes wrong, but Miss Konda holds Amber ...

1131.content:
The naga smiled. "I just wanted to let you know a few things, as you're the only human at this school."

You nod, knowing there were very likely some things that you wouldn't be accustomed to in a school of monsters.

"There's really only one important thing you need to know - we tend to enjoy swallowing humans, and sometimes each other. But, it's never for digestion - just for fun, most of the time."

"To tell the truth, I'm not exactly surprised," you explain. "But, I'm relieved to know I'd be safe. Thanks for letting me know, Miss Konda."

She smiles enthusiastically. "Oh, no problem, Amber!"

But, as Amber turned to leave, she felt something wrap around her - it was Miss Konda's tail. "I'm guessing you want to be the first one to swallow me, right?"

"Do you mind?" She brought Amber closer to her. Amber shook her head. "Good! But, I'd rather do this in a more comfortable spot. If you want, I can take you back to my dorm room?"
1131.title: A warning... and a demonstration

choices: Miss Konda surprises Amber by squeezing out a wave of mustard from head to toe
Miss Konda decides to unbirth Amber
11311.content:
"But it's only second period - wouldn't my teacher know I'm missing?"

Miss Konda laughed. "She'll probably just think someone already got to you, which they will have." She took Amber by the hand and led her out the door and through a winding path of hallways until they reached a hall labeled: "Teacher's Dorms." A sign on the door read: "No student entrance without staff approval."

The naga's room happened to be the third on the left. It was rather spacious inside, with a full desk in the far-left corner with a small fridge next to it, and a king-sized bed in the upper-right. The walls were painted a dark blue.

Miss Konda led Amber inside, and asked her to sit down on the bed. "I haven't had a human in my belly in a long while! So, do you have any preferences on which way you'd like to go in? Or should I leave it a surprise for you? If I were you, I'd choose the surprise!"

Amber couldn't help but smile at her excitement - the teacher was far more energetic than she'd imagined. "Okay, I'll leave it up to you."

"Awesome!"
11311.title: Miss Konda's room

choices: She lets you out after school is over for the day
You stay inside her for a few days
113111.content:
You watch as Miss Konda slides over to her fridge, and pulls out a bottle, which she takes back over to you. She twists open the cap. "Ready?"

You nod with a smile. "Sure."

The bottle moves to the top of your head, and you suddenly feel a cold shiver down your spine as Miss Konda squeezes out a line of mustard. She draws lines down the length of your hair, and uses her hands to mix it in. Moments later, she starts another line, moving from your forehead downward in a wave pattern until she reached your feet. Another mustard wave was drawn along both your arms.

"Well, you look quite appetizing, Amber," the naga teased. "I think I'll try some." She takes your feet in her hands and gently pushes them into her mouth. You start laughing as her tongue tickles the bottom of your feet. As she does this, you take the bottle and squeeze out more into your hand . You coat your arms and face, and then squeeze some down the front of your shirt.

It doesn't take her long to swallow you up to your waist, and as she's naga, it's much easier for her body to stretch. You can feel your legs being squeezed by her powerful throat muscles that help to pull you in. As she engulfs your chest, she gives your breasts a playful chew before swallowing again. her tongues rolls over your face to lick up all of the mustard that now coats her face as well.

A final swallow sends you sliding all the way into her stomach, which seems to form to your shape. It feels very warm, and though you can't see anything, you'd guess that the walls around you were quite pink.

Miss Konda gives a soft "Urp! -Oh, excuse me. That was delicious! Thank you, Amber, for letting me be the first to taste you!"

You laugh to yourself. So far, you don't feel any acids trying to dissolve you. "Er, you're welcome? I have to admit, that was really, really weird. But, am I really going to be okay in here?"

"Oh, of course you are, silly! I'll just keep you in there for a while, and let you out then, alright?"

"Okay," you agree. You can feel the naga slither out of her room and down the hall.
113111.title: Miss Konda surprises Amber by squeezing out a w...

113112.content:
The naga looks up and down your body a few times, then looks down at her own body. "Hmm.. You know what? i think I've changed my mind about something."

"You did?" you ask, slightly confused. Then you watch her hand move down her body and past her navel to her regions, which she prys open with a couple fingers.

"I think you'll do better inside my other tummy! Her, let me have your feet." You let her take hold of your feet, and watch she slips all ten toes into the slit. She gasps at the stretching - it was obvious she wasn't used to doing this.

"Are you okay?" you ask.

She nods, her face rather red. "I - I've been wanting to do this for a long time, but I think I should have practiced first..."

"Do you want to just eat me instead? It'd be easier," you suggest, not wanting to accidentally hurt her.
113112.title: Miss Konda decides to unbirth Amber

1131121.content:
She shakes her head. "Don't worry- I'll get you inside just fine. it'll just take a little longer than I thought." She then continues to slowly push you down, and within twenty minutes, you are fully within Miss Konda's womb.

You feel her coil up, curling your body a little as she settles down on her bed, her human half resting over you. "Whew, that took a lot out of me. I think I'll sleep for a while. You should get some rest, too. How is it in there?"

"I'm fine," you reply. "It's actually rather comfortable."

She laughs, and yawns. "Well, that's good to hear. I think I'll just keep you inside me, then. You're going to be my new baby."

This admittedly shocked you. Had she simply used you in order to make you her own child? Not that you'd argue against such a thing, but she at least could have asked, you think to yourself. Before you can ask, you realize she's already fallen asleep.

"Oh well," you say to yourself. "Nothing I can do about it." Soon you, too, are fast asleep.
1131121.title: "No. I'll get you in there."

choices: Argue some more - maybe she'll rethink her plans
Silently accept it - there's no use in arguing with a naga
11311211.content:
You feel yourself uncurl as Miss Konda wakes up. "Good morning, Amber," she says with a yawn, patting the bulge in her tail. "Are you awake?"

"I am," you reply. "Am I going to be in here for the day?"

"The whole day. Like I said last night, I'm just going to keep you inside of me. I like you, and I want you to be my daughter."

"What?! But - but I have parents already! ANd isn't this against the school rules?"

Miss Konda doesn't seem to pay attention to your complaints. "Oh, don't worry - once your tail grows in, you'll forget everything about your past life. It'll be just you and me!"

You can't believe it - your teacher has tricked you, and there is absolutely nothing you can do.
11311211.title: The next morning

113112112.content:
You realize there's nothing you can do at this point - any attempt to escape could be disastrous. teras sliding down your face, you silently accept your new life, and quickly fall fast asleep.

You end up going into unconsciousness, silently sleeping as Miss Konda's pregnancy moves along. Scales begin to form along your legs, turning your skin hard, but at the same time offering protection. Your legs zip together, and their bones dissolve away to make room for new organs. As it forms, your new tail begins to grow longer. Your hair grows longer as well, and your human skin softens.
113112112.title: Accepting it

1131121121.content:
Then after a week of lying in Miss Konda's body slowly changing.You feel
Miss Konda constricting on your body and you have a feeling that you're going to be unbirthed soon.
Then you feel a pushing as you slide out head first soon followed by your 5' torso with D cup breasts you look into a close mirror in Miss Konda's room to find yourself looking into a feminine face with slightly snakey features and yellow reptilian eyes. You love your body as the last of your 15' tail comes out.

Miss Konda looks at you to say "OK what should I call you?"
"I should be named Anne Konda. If that's alright with you mum." You reply.
"Yes it's alright. Go off to class Anna."
1131121121.title: You're ready to come out

choices: He's friendly. Agree to the date.
11311211211.content:
In class, some of the monsters who wouldn't have noticed your human self suddenly started paying more attention to you. Either that or some of them were in love with the new you.

Suddenly, you felt someone tap you on your shoulder and you looked back to see a handsome werewolf standing there. "Hi, I'm Rex. I don't believe I've seen you before. May I sit next to you?". He sems friendly enough and so you agree and then he asks, "Want to go out on a date with me?".
11311211211.title: In class

1131121122.content:
After the transformation from human to naga was complete, Amber began to de-age. Slowly Miss Konda’s body was forcing Amber back to the age of an infant. It was a slow process; it would be months before Amber was the same age as a new-born.


“Hey there Anna.” One of Miss Konda’s friends called out to her.

“Hey Julie,” Anna said, Julia had the lower body of a spider and upper body of a human woman, “How’s it going?”

“Not bad, you look pretty happy with yourself. What’s up?” Julie asked.

“Remember how I’ve been wanted to have a baby for a while now? Well I soon will.” Anna giggled.

“Congratulations Anna, that’s wonderful.” Julie said with a smile.
1131121122.title: The full experience

Amber walked into a large room and slipped and fell down.She landed on her butt.Amber looked down on the floor to see that it ws covered in pink slime.Then Amber looked over to the front of the class.behind the desk was a tall pink slimegirl.She looked about ten feet tall.Then Amber looked over at the slimegirl's stomach.She had a mermaid girl trapped inside her.The mermaid girl looked like she was very scared and was trying to escape.Then Amber saw that she was the only kid in the classroom.(Other than the mermaid girl.)It was then that Amber saw the slimegirl coming right at her.Amber was scared and couldn't move her legs.Then the slimegirl grabbed Amber's arm and helped her to her feet.

Amber sat at the desk in the middle of the front row.The bell rang and class started.Amber was taking notes when she dropped her pencil.It rolled next to a shy naga girl next to her.Amber asked the naga for her pencil.But then Miss.Flan walked up to Amber and said.....
12.title: Math,and Miss.Flan

choices: Does Miss Flan remember not to digest Amber?
121.content:
Before Amber could apologise Miss Flan was upon her.
With her face already stuck Amber watched her fellow pupils through the thickness of slime as Miss Flan returned to the front of the class to continue the lesson.

For obvious reasons Amber was struggling to listen to what Miss Flan was teaching as she quickly sunk into Miss Flan's bulk and still struggling she floated closer to the mermaid.

Amber knew she should try and relax as all the other pupils could see her and it would be embarrassing to be known as a scared human. But then she realised that many of the eyes were focused on her breasts that were now clearly visible though her soaked shirt.

She was sure that Miss Flan was intending to let her go at the end of class. At least she certainly hoped so.
It was then that Amber noticed a fizzing sound in her ears.

Amber didn't know whether Miss Flan always made this noise or whether it was the sound of digestion. That was when Amber started to panic again.
121.title: Miss Flan absorbs Amber

choices: Another human girl starts at the school #1
Another human girl starts at the school #2
Miss Flan goes to explain the accident.
1212.content:
Amber looked around her trying to find the source of she sizzling sound.

She looked down at herself and was reassured that although her shirt had been soaked by Miss Flan's slime it wasn't being digested.

But the reassurance wasn’t helping much as everyone was now looking at her with looks of fascination or horror. Or maybe it was hunger?

Miss Flan continued to teach as if she had forgotten that she held two pupils in her body but Amber was now finding new things to worry about. Not just the physical sensations as they were starting to fade. It was the looks that she was getting and the mermaid that was trapped with her.

When she had first got over the sizzling sound she had started to worry about the tingling sensation on her skin but now even that was gone. Fading away as she rocked back and forth to Miss Flan's internal tides as she moved about.

As Amber let the current roll her backwards she suddenly realised that she was flashing the class and struggled to get upright again. But it seemed harder than it should be. Her arms and legs felt weak and that was when she noticed her shoes floating away from her.

Amber tried to retrieve her shoes but found she was unable to direct her movements, she realised that she was now fully subject to the currents in Miss Flan's slime and that she seemed to be sinking deeper.

As Miss Flan started to wipe down the board, possibly writing out instructions for the next class, Amber watched her plaid skirt come adrift. But now Amber was really struggling to absorb any information. No sooner had she tried to put a thought together than it dissipated. Her mind was like a mist that blew away in the wind.

That might have been Amber's last thought as her clothes, now empty, sunk to the base of Miss Flan's body.

Amber's body was gone. Her substance absorbed by the teacher's body who made full use of the girl's body and soul.

When the class was over Miss Flan remembered the mermaid she had been holding captive and warned the girl about not being naughty in class again.

Then noticing the bits of uniform and underwear in her slime trail Miss Flan realised that she'd accidentally absorbed their only human pupil.

With a sigh of regret Miss Flan wondered if they would get a replacement human to teach as she really hadn't had the opportunity to enjoy the taste of the girl she'd digested.
1212.title: Miss Flan only enjoys meat.

choices: miss flan does not care much, but has to.

12123.title: Miss Flan goes to explain the accident.

121232.content:
Miss Flan realizes the problems that she has caused. Her own student has been digested in her body, something she didn't expect and should have taken great time realizing. It was an accident on her part, something she thinks was natural anyway. As a monster herself, Amber should have probably done something to stop herself from getting in trouble.

She doesn't care about what happened, but feels that the whole situation will come back to haunt her. This might be problematic in the future if she expects anyone to trust her. Hoping to rectify eating Amber, Miss Flan wonders if she can do anything about it.

With the class over, she might as well pack up and go on with her life. However, Amber had been digested by her body, and she feels something can be done. Even though she became clueless to Amber still inside her, there might be a bit of her residue within that might help restore her back to human form.

An idea pops into her head. If anything, there is another who might help fix this predicament. Heading out of the classroom, Miss Flan slushes her way through the halls. The room she is looking for is somewhere in this Academy.

Her squishy body travels as fast as she can until she slows down before a room. Looking at the room number, Miss Flan sighs and enters the room itself. Noticing the class empty, Miss Flan pouts, hoping that the teacher was still present to help her.

A necromancer has been teaching science for a while, with vast knowledge of different potions that had their own wild effects. She was teaching the kids how to create a baby elemental to raise as their own. With her not present, Miss Flan sees this as a bit of a drag.

Ready to leave the classroom, Miss Flan looks over at a shelf with cabinets and thinks of checking them out. Each one has various labels on them in case of emergency or if someone planned to use them.

With this opportunity present, Miss Flan goes to check it out. She goes through the list of potions on the shelf before checking the cabinets. Acidification, flight, telekinesis, bubbles, fire-breathing, none of these were what she hoped. There must be some type of revival-type potion somewhere that she could use.
121232.title: miss flan does not care much, but has to.

1431.content:
Just when she made her way through the door way. Amber felt a slightly clawed hand gram her arm. Looking over her shoulder she saw who stopped her. It was Yin. Yin seemed to be staring her down with a needing smile.

“Do you need something?” Amber slowly asked. ‘I don’t like this feeling I am getting, ‘ She thought.

Amber turns surprised to see a human smile."You are human right I'm not under a spell or anything."Amber twirls her hair than chews on it a bit.
"Unless you want a spell I'm about 90% human and 10% witch," she laughs." I'm Safiya Akh we can help each other from all the hormone crazy monsters and people that want to eat us."
Amber fidgets diverting her eyes as they glides over the girl she just met. Honey colored locks of natural tangles and curls that fall to her shoulder elongating her lean posture with eyes the color of her name and a pendant of an Egyptian symbol that seems familiar.
155.title: Bewitched

choices: "You have a sick sense of humor,"
"What does that have to do with me."
1551.content: "This",Safiya points to the pendant and smiles,"its the Egyptian all seeing eye.Legend has it Ra who had become pharaoh was becoming old and weak the people of the land no longer respected his authority. They broke laws and taunted him with little to no regard. He punished man by sending his daughter Sekhmet with the Eye of Ra. He abruptly removed her from the Ureas or royal serpent sending her to earth in the form of a lioness. A war was waged upon humanity it was a blood bathe with her strong lust of gluttonous appetite. Overwhelming can't even describe how Ra felt,soon fearing for the lives of all humanity he called her back to him.Her blood lust was so great she disregarded his pleas. Causing him to arrange seventy-thousand jugs of beer and pomegranate juice ,giving the drink an illusion of blood, to be poured upon lands surrounding her. Sekhmet gorged on the blood intoxicating herself in a deep slumber for three days saving mankind from her wrath, but not saving her from a hangover,"she giggled.
1551.title: Old Tales

info.brief_description: Amber must go to a new high school, full of monster-girl teachers and students
info.description:
When her parents take new jobs in a new city Amber, a 17 year old brown haired green eyed girl, must go to a whole new all-girls school. But there’s a problem: Amber is the only human in the whole school. The rest of the students, and the teachers, are various monster girls; nagas, slimes, mermaids and more.
If you add, which I hope you do, please follow these guidelines:

1. No toilet stuff!
2. I really would appreciate no interaction with giant males. Since it's an all girls school there shouldn't be any men anyway.
3.Sex allowed (Just don't go overboard on it)*
*I'll allow guy on girl, and girl on girl stuff, but NO guy on guy.
4. At least try to use proper spelling and grammar
5. Try for at least a paragraph (You can do one-liners for choice chapters but you should then do one of those choices)
6. Keep consistent!
7. swears and cusses are allowed to a degree
8. Please respect any and all choices marked reserved

Other than that, go nuts!

*Disclaimer: I reserve the right to edit and/or delete chapters as I see fit*
